programme.title: Dumb Money
programme.desc: Keith Gill, a humble financial analyst known only as 'Roaring Kitty' on social media, sparks a revolution against Wall Street through the mass buying of stock in a failing video game retailer.

programme.title: Resident Evil: Afterlife
programme.desc: Alice learns of a mysterious haven named Arcadia while fighting the Umbrella Corporation. She decides to join a group of survivors headed to Arcadia, unaware that they are walking into a trap.

programme.title: Matilda
programme.desc: Matilda shares a home with her parents and brother, who do not appreciate her. When her principal tortures her and a kind-hearted teacher, she uses her telekinetic powers to settle scores.

programme.title: Against The Dark
programme.desc: Tao and his team of ex-military vigilantes must use their sword-fighting skills to fight off vampire-zombies and get a group of survivors to safety before the entire area is blown off the map.

programme.title: Chef Vs Fridge
programme.desc: Chefs Anuj Satam and Sneha Senapati show their innovative skills by preparing delectable dishes with leftover food, which leave Chef Vicky Ratnani amazed.

programme.title: xXx
programme.desc: The US government recruits extreme sports athlete Xander Cage to infiltrate a Russian criminal ring, which is plotting the destruction of the world.

programme.title: Leave No Trace
programme.desc: After Will and Tom's life in the woods gets uprooted, the father-daughter duo try to adapt to the rules of civilisation. While Tom learns new skills, Will's fears slowly begin engulfing him.

programme.title: The Karate Kid
programme.desc: Dre Parker, a young American boy living in China, gets frequently bullied by Cheng, a martial artist. To stand up for himself, Dre tries to learn kung fu under the tutelage of Mr Han.

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Marcus, a family man, and Mike, a ladies' man, are partners in the Miami police. Things get complicated when they assume each other's identity while investigating a drug deal.

programme.title: Priest
programme.desc: A veteran warrior, Priest, breaks his sacred vows to hunt down the vampires who kidnapped his niece. Hick, his niece's boyfriend, along with Priestess, a former warrior, join him in the quest.

programme.title: Sniper 2
programme.desc: A Marine sniper is forced to team up with a convict on death-row to take out a rogue general as he is committing various inhumane acts on a certain ethnic group.

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: When Peter Venkman, Raymond Stantz and Egon Spengler lose their jobs as scientists, they start an establishment called Ghostbusters to fight the evil ghosts lurking in New York City.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: Douglas Quaid tries to find the reason behind his recurring dream about Mars. He soon learns that a false memory has been planted into his brain and the people responsible for this want him dead.

programme.title: Underworld: Blood Wars
programme.desc: Selene, an elite vampire assassin with very few allies on her side, tries to end a long-running war between the clan that betrayed her and the Lycans.

programme.title: Iti Rohini
programme.desc: A group of starkly different individuals navigate through various experiences and challenges as they discover that love holds the power to make and break lives.

programme.title: Cycling Shoes
programme.desc: On his birthday, Harold is thrilled to receive a new pair of cycling shoes. However, his damaged bike and plans to save money for a school trip with his crush pose challenges to his dreams.

programme.title: Desert Lights
programme.desc: A young boy feels dejected as he sees his town engulfed by drought and joins his friends who try to relive their childhood memories.

programme.title: A Day's Work
programme.desc: A Caucasian family hires three immigrant labourers to help move their belongings to a new house. What starts out as a fair deal gets escalated into a violent confrontation.

programme.title: Temporary
programme.desc: In a massive metropolis, when a child disappears, the mother begins a search for her missing son, going miles in futility and grief.

programme.title: Umang
programme.desc: A young woman waits for her husband to return home. However, little does she know that their future is far darker than she ever imagined.

programme.title: Do Pal
programme.desc: After spending a night with Soniya, a young woman, Neil decides to propose to her. However, things do not go as planned.

programme.title: Sepia
programme.desc: A married couple struggles to keep their marriage afloat because of their shortcomings. However, one evening, their life changes forever after they realise one thing that holds them together.

programme.title: Visa
programme.desc: In order to make a living, a young man earnestly applies to several places but is unable to find employment. Ultimately, he decides to go abroad, but when he applies for a visa, he falls into trouble.

programme.title: Mehrooni
programme.desc: A commuter in a Mumbai train is used to seeing a couple travelling together. One day, when he sees the husband sitting alone, he questions him and discovers a rare love story.

programme.title: Baby Steps
programme.desc: A casanova wakes up one morning and finds a baby at his doorstep. His conscience does not allow him to leave the baby outside, so he decides to manage work without failing to nurture the baby.

programme.title: My Sisters Boyfriend
programme.desc: When a man visits his girlfriend, he meets someone he does not anticipate to meet, namely his girlfriend's sister, who is waiting for him.

programme.title: The Beard
programme.desc: A popular television personality, who covers prime time news, faces various challenges while stepping into the shoes of a method actor.

programme.title: Idar
programme.desc: A man wrongly framed in a murder case tries everything he can in order to prove his innocence and clear the charges filed against him.

programme.title: Mayathirai
programme.desc: When a man's sins get him trapped in a fictional world, he gets a chance to redeem himself by travelling back in time. In doing so, he also gets an opportunity to escape the place forever.

programme.title: Fey
programme.desc: When a man brings home a painting, he discovers that the artwork is cursed and soon begins to experience paranormal activities.

programme.title: Please Don't Date
programme.desc: Home appliance developer Seo Jisung dreams of an easy life like a welldesigned algorithm. The "smart voice recognition AI refrigerator" she is in the process of developing accidentally gets combined with an antiterrorism super sensor chip that went missing from the National Intelligence Service Korea. Her refrigerator that couldn't even determine whether an ingredient was rotten suddenly identifies human lowlifes without even needing her to tell it to. This leads to revealing the truth about Jisung's fiance. The man she thought of as an elite was actually a criminal. At the perfect timing, Jung Gukhee, a firefighter that seems too good to be true shows up in her life.

programme.title: Maa Ka Anchal

programme.title: Meri Saas Pehle Aap
programme.desc: Movie starring Kajal Raghwani, Lado Madhesiya, Kanchan Mishra and directed by Manjul Thakur.

programme.title: Duaah Biyah
programme.desc: Two brothers, Vijay and Kishan, navigate life's challenges together. Their lives take a turn when Vijay remarries a girl named Suman, intertwining their fates in unexpected ways.

programme.title: Senur
programme.desc: Bhavna's family educate her and arranges her marriage to Deepak. However, suspicions arise within Deepak's family due to Bhavna's interactions with a spirit named Veer, her childhood lover.

programme.title: Ek Aur Dharmatma
programme.desc: A young goon falls in love with a beautiful woman, who is also loved by a minister who looks forward to marrying her. Later, the minister's aide falsely frames the goon in the minister's murder case.

programme.title: Badmash No. 1
programme.desc: Ram, the son of Bhavani Shankar, and Anjali, the daughter of Narasimha, fall in love with each other while living abroad. Upon their return to India, they try to reunite their warring fathers.

programme.title: Aakhri Ghulam
programme.desc: Bheema, his father Dinu and generations of their family have been slaves of the wealthy Thakurs. One day, he challenges their authority and invites trouble for himself in the process.

programme.title: Devta
programme.desc: Balram, a rogue, who works for crime lord Bajrang decides to kill inspector Rakesh for sending him to prison. However, he changes his mind when he learns a secret about Rakesh.

programme.title: Dhadkan
programme.desc: Anjali and Dev are in love with each other and plan to marry, but her family gets her married to Ram. Years later, Dev shows up to reunite with Anjali, however, she has fallen in love with Ram.

programme.title: Madam Geeta Rani
programme.desc: A dogged headmistress teaches everyone a lesson in perseverance as she battles bureaucracy and corrupt officials to bring her government-run school up to scratch.

programme.title: Rang
programme.desc: A father of two girls finds himself in a difficult situation when he finds out that the man Pooja admires is in love with his other daughter, Kajol.

programme.title: Thanedaar
programme.desc: Two brothers are separated after the death of their police inspector father. Fatefully, one joins the underworld while the other follows in his father's footsteps.

programme.title: Voltage 420
programme.desc: Childhood friends Krishna and Radha fall in love but fail to convey their feelings to each other. Fate takes Krishna abroad and after he returns, he is shocked when he meets Radha.

programme.title: Mr. Natwarlal
programme.desc: When Natwar's elder brother is framed for bribery, he decides to avenge his brother's humiliation and thus poses as a crime lord.

programme.title: Kaun Kare Kurbani
programme.desc: Honest and upright, Inspector Arjun is very different from his happy-go-lucky younger brother Ajit. Their relationship hits rocky ground after Ajit is accused of murder.

programme.title: Jeevan Yudh
programme.desc: In order to find his father's killer, Rohit goes back to his hometown. When he meets the new police officer, he unravels a dark truth.

programme.title: Pardesi Babu
programme.desc: Raju, a poor villager, falls in love with Chinni, a wealthy runaway bride. Chinni's father opposes their love and challenges Raju to acquire INR one crore within a year if he wants to marry Chinni.

programme.title: Taqdeer Ka Tamasha
programme.desc: An officer shares a strained relationship with his brother Satya, a criminal. When he tries to collect evidence against a goon, he meets his sibling. But they are not aware of the gangster's secrets.

programme.title: Gunjan Saxena: The Kargil Girl
programme.desc: An ambitious Gunjan Saxena eyes becoming a pilot after being drawn by the idea of a life in a cockpit. Despite facing reservations, she fulfils her dream and serves the country in the Kargil War.

programme.title: James
programme.desc: James comes to the city of dreams hoping to make it big. Working as a bouncer at a nightclub, he gets on the wrong side of a powerful political family.

programme.title: Daddy
programme.desc: Arun Gawli, a young man, is forced to turn to crime for making a livelihood. However, what starts with a simple 'matka' gambling ring, soon turns into a full-fledged criminal network.

programme.title: Rashmi Rocket
programme.desc: A small-town girl goes on to become a national-level athlete while overcoming societal barriers. However, her glory is interrupted when she is forced to undergo a gender test.

programme.title: No Entry
programme.desc: Kishen, a faithful husband, is goaded by his philandering friend, Prem, to have an extramarital affair. However, as their lies mount up, so does the hilarious confusion and their wives' suspicions.

programme.title: Gangaajal
programme.desc: An honest superintendent of police, IPS Amit Kumar, is assigned to a town to reduce its crime rates. There, he has to face corrupt fellow officers and politicians while dealing with brutal criminals.

programme.title: Pakka Commercial
programme.desc: Suryanarayana, a judge, steps down as he fails to provide justice to a sexually-harassed girl. His son, Lucky, too becomes a lawyer but works with criminals for quick gains.

programme.title: Velaiilla Pattadhari
programme.desc: Raghuvaran, an educated yet unemployed engineer, is unwilling to accept jobs that are unrelated to his area of expertise. Soon, his mother's tragic death brings him a job as well as grave challenges.

programme.title: Singh Is Bliing
programme.desc: Raftaar Singh always runs away from responsibilities. Frustrated by his behaviour, his father asks him to either marry Sweety or relocate to Goa and work with his father's friend.

programme.title: Robocroc
programme.desc: A rocket filled with bots contaminates a crocodile's food and it turns into a cyborg. The military attempt to take it down but a mysterious person is controlling it.

programme.title: 23rd March 1931 - Shaheed
programme.desc: Bhagat Singh, a freedom fighter, is arrested for killing the British official responsible for the death of his mentor, Lala Lajpat Rai. He is ultimately hanged for his actions.

programme.title: Pavitra Rishta
programme.desc: When Archana tries to wake up her younger sister, Varsha, the latter requests her to let her sleep some more time. Archana then tells her mother that she will cook the food and asks her to rest.

programme.title: Ek Tha Raja Ek Thi Rani
programme.desc: Gayatri tries to see Indravadan and almost drops a flowerpot on him by mistake. Later, the guards try to enter her house to investigate who dropped the flowerpot.

programme.title: Kaala Teeka
programme.desc: A girl child is doomed for life as she is subjected to superstitious beliefs and is made to follow a high born girl to ward her off from evil eyes.

programme.title: Sapne Suhane Ladakpan Ke
programme.desc: Two teenage girls, who have been brought up in diametrically opposite environments, form a bond and try to help each other in every phase of their lives.

programme.title: Apna Time Bhi Aayega
programme.desc: Malini is shocked on learning the truth from Veer about Rani being his wife and accuses Rajeshwari of trying to deceive her. However, Rani steps in and takes Rajeshwari's side.

programme.title: Paramavatar Shri Krishna
programme.desc: Alambasur displays his strength to Krishna's friends. Balram attacks him with his 'gada' and defeats him. Alambasur tells Kansa that he has found the eight child of Devki.

programme.title: Jodha Akbar

programme.title: Fear Files - Dar Ki Sacchi Tasveerein

programme.desc: Experts investigate if a nearby exoplanet may be home to an alien civilisation of strange and metallic monsters.

programme.title: Richard Hammond's Big
programme.desc: Richard ventures two kilometres beneath the Alps into the world's longest underground railway connection, the Brenner Base Tunnel, riding some giant machine.

programme.title: How The Universe Works
programme.desc: With a cast of experts and eye-popping CGI, the host looks under the celestial hood to tell the greatest story of all.

programme.title: My Feet Are Killing Me
programme.desc: Heather's ankle was rebuilt from parts of her body after a horrific car accident during her childhood. It is up to Dr Vincent to help her walk again.

programme.title: Dallas Car Sharks
programme.desc: Ash and JD throw down at the drag strip with dueling Corvettes; Martha adds some of her glamour to a Honda Prelude; Tommy searches high and low for the right car.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: The top three prepare their cars for a race night and Farmtruck and AZN line up against Murder Nova's father. On race night, tensions flare between Chuck and Shane.

programme.title: Diesel Brothers
programme.desc: The crew race to finish a six-door stretched F650 Expedition Camper for a big client. Plus, Heavy D shocks the guys with a diesel-powered experimental helicopter.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: The racers of the 405 struggle to get their cars ready after a tough few weeks of list racing, while Farmtruck and AZN head out of town for an Enduro Race.

programme.title: Diesel Brothers
programme.desc: Redbeard gets Heavy D to rework an old stretched six-door F650 with a camper. Later, the guys buy a Hummer H1 from a mysterious mountain man.

programme.title: Fast N' Loud
programme.desc: The men pick up the pace on their 1949 Chevrolet. Plus, the Gas Monkey Monster Jam truck goes up against Dennis Anderson's Grave Digger.

programme.title: Diesel Brothers
programme.desc: The crew race to finish a six-door stretched F650 Expedition Camper for a big client. Plus, Heavy D shocks the guys with a diesel-powered experimental helicopter.

programme.title: FourWheeler
programme.desc: Ian pays homage to the box-style Bronco of the past by adding an upgraded suspension and bumpers for a more aggressive look.

programme.title: Roadkill's Junkyard Gold
programme.desc: Steve Magnante gives a lesson on two of the classic cars, the Plymouth Road Runner and the Dodge Super Bee.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: The Dodge SRT-10 truck has an 8.3-liter V10 Viper engine and Mike finds one at a price he can not resist. Once Ant is sold on the plan, they dive in to work on it.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Big Chief struggles with PTSD after his crash while the 405 racers return to intense list racing. Meanwhile, Farmtruck searches for AZN's first car.

programme.title: Dallas Car Sharks
programme.desc: After a grueling day at the auction, Martha lands a scarce 1962 Chevrolet Greenbriar van that needs a complete restoration while JD gets his hands dirty on a Camaro.

programme.title: FourWheeler
programme.desc: Ian builds a lot of custom parts to finish work on his all-aluminium Land Rover Defender. Further, Ian also bui include a one-off exhaust and a bumper to hold the new winch.

programme.title: Garage Rehab
programme.desc: Richard helps a fellow hot rod enthusiast in Nashville. With less than a week to transform the shop, the crew have their work cut out for them in Music City.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike has found a classic 1964 Triumph TR4 in British racing green. It is rust-free, but it has been sitting for 20 years and Ant has a big refurbishing job on his hands.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Daddy Dave returns as part of the Shark Pool with Henson's corvette Plan B, along with new mother Tina Pierce and Boosted GT, after being dropped from the list.

programme.title: Junkyard Empire
programme.desc: Andy and Tim take on a professional drifting course, while Blair tackles a luxurious 2013 Audi A8 L. Elsewhere, Dave installs a new rear end on Andy's 1966 Chevrolet Nova.

programme.title: FourWheeler
programme.desc: Ian does not keep anything stock so he creates his own short bed Jeep Gladiator. To do the customisation, he transforms a Jeep JK with a Gladiator truck bed.

programme.title: Throttle Out
programme.desc: Zack and Ari live in California, but for lots of people winter is very problematic thus, the duo explores ways of cold-proofing bikes.

programme.title: Fast N' Loud
programme.desc: Richard buys Aaron a 1942 Harley-Davidson WLA '45. The aim is to rebuild the bike to its original era in order to participate in a vintage race in New Jersey.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: The guys are excited when they find a legendary 1991 Toyota MR2 Turbo. But, one small fix becomes a big problem for Ant as the entire engine has to be removed.

programme.title: Garage Rehab
programme.desc: Richard commits to rehabilitating a 4x4 shop in New Caney, Texas, that has fallen on hard times.

programme.title: Street Outlaws
programme.desc: Chief introduces an idea to make the list even faster, the Shark Pool. Plus, a hungry group of street racers show up every week.

programme.title: American Chopper
programme.desc: Senior takes a risk by starting a Spartan Race-inspired build before meeting the client. Later, he has to change course to accommodate his requests.

programme.title: Junkyard Empire
programme.desc: Bobby fixes up a '76 Datsun 260Z as a surprise gift for his wife. Later, Andy takes a Jeep Wrangler to Ocean City Jeep Week but a must-fix problem pops up.

programme.title: Hot Rod Garage
programme.desc: Tony Angelo and Lucky Costa host a project build show that has all the tips, tricks and wrenching one would expect from the crew at Hot Rod Magazine.

programme.title: Throttle Out
programme.desc: Zack and Ari investigate an almost extinct two-stroke motorcycle desired by many.

programme.title: Garage Rehab
programme.desc: Richard Rawlings loans $2,50,000 in time, money and resources to a declining garage in Los Angeles.

programme.title: Junkyard Empire
programme.desc: Andy decides to unveil the 1967 Chevy Camaro pace car at an upcoming car show and throws the whole garage into chaos.

programme.title: Garage Rehab
programme.desc: Richard uses his time, money and resources to help an up-and-coming motorcycle shop in Jackson, Mississippi.

programme.title: American Chopper
programme.desc: OCC builds a bike inspired by a 1965 GTO, however, the job may cause Senior to miss his deadline for the first time. Meanwhile, fabrication changes cause problems for Junior's design.

programme.title: Junkyard Empire
programme.desc: When a beat-up Chevy truck rolls into the yard, Andy thinks it is too valuable to crush. Bobby is not pleased when Andy decides to flip it, but Andy sees dollar signs.

A friend who troubles everybody in the village, to a son-in-law who ends up tearing his father-in-law's clothes! Watch this show for more such situational comedy.

programme.title: Mridul Ki Duniya

A must-watch show for all families and age groups, which will make you laugh out loud!

programme.title: Shudh Desi Tadka
programme.desc: Chef Kapil: Chef Kapil delivers easy and healthy recipes in his soothing voice. Watch Chef Kapil for easy to make recipes, including home made tikkas, main course dishes and desserts. Learn to make chocolate lava cake, paneer khurchan and more recipes at home. The best part? Chef also gives alternative ingredients, so that nothing can come in the way of your cooking! Enjoy the dishes and Chef Kapil's engaging personality.

programme.title: Thari Bijili
programme.desc: Thari Bijli represents our daily life, with a healthy dose of humour! Bijli covers topics we can relate to, like a grandparent gone missing and the entire household searching for her. Or, what happens when Bijli and her grandmother are unable to make a call because of poor network connectivity. Each day, every family member is trying to do their best in a way which makes us smile and laugh. You will love Thari Bijli for the family and their antics!
